betterquesting:10.desc:8:
[quest]Ball Lightning[/quest]

§6Machine Type: §a(Plasma/Electric) Arc Furnace§r | §aFusion Reactor§r | §aStar Kernal Generator§r

[note]This structure requires at least Infinity Coils[/note]

The Ball Lightning has §c4§r levels, each unlocking a different mode. 

§9T1§r: Arc Furnace
§9T2§r: Plasma Arc Furnace
§9T3§r: Fusion Reactor
§9T4§r: Star Kernal Generator

Base Structure is T1.
Gravitational Lens in the Controller unlocks T2.
Making the T2 Structure and Ball Lightning Upgrade Chip in the Controller unlocks T3.
Advanced High Power Coil unlocks T4.

§5Wireless Mode§r

T4 Ball Lightning unlocks Wireless EU Mode
Processing Time will be fixed at §c3.2§r seconds, and EU cost increases to §c64x§r

You can put more Upgrade Chips into the controller block to decrease processing time at the cost of an EU increase.

Processing Time = Default / Upgrade Chip Stack Size
EU Cost = Recipe Value * Upgrade Chip Stack Size ^ §c2§r * §c64§r

§6 --- Machine Modes --- §r

§aPlasma/Electric Arc Furnace§r:

Parallel = §c2§r ^ (Compact Fusion Coil Tier * (Coil Tier - §c10§r))

§aFusion Reactor§r:

Maximum EU consumption: §c4§r ^ (Compact Fusion Coil Tier - §c2§r) * §c1.8§r ^ (Field Generator Tier - §c1§r)
§c65,536x§r Parallel | §9Perfect Overclock§r
Max Recipe Tier is limited by Compact Fusion Coil Tier

§aStar Kernal Generator§r:

Almost Infinite Parallel | Upgrade the Field Generator for faster speeds
EU Modifier: §c1§r - §r9.9%§r * (Field Generator Tier - §c1§r)

[note]Use a §aScrewdriver§r to change modes[/note]
